content:
# I have successfully crafted another electronic circuit. My updated inventory now includes:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 5 coal
# - 8 stones
# - 5 copper ore
# - 2 iron plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 2 electronic circuits

# The stone furnace remains idle with 23 units of coal and no ingredients to smelt.

# With 2 electronic circuits, I can now consider crafting an assembling machine, which requires:
# - 1 electronic circuit
# - 9 iron plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 1 transport belt

# Currently, I have:
# - 2 electronic circuits
# - 2 iron plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 2 transport belts

# I need more iron plates and transport belts to craft the assembling machine. 
# I can smelt more iron ore to get additional iron plates and craft more transport belts.

# Let's first smelt the remaining iron ore into iron plates. I have 5 iron ore in my inventory, so I will return to the stone furnace to smelt them.

# Move back to the stone furnace to insert the iron ore and coal for smelting.
move_to(Position(-5.0, 5.0))  # Move to the stone furnace location.
